definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

pinyin: Zhong1 Mei3 Wen2 hua4 Yan2 jiu1 Zhong1 xin1

sentences.english: Will the issue affect the overall China-US relations?
sentences.chinese: 這一問題是否將影響到中美關係大局？

sentences.english: The move puts the brakes on efforts to improve relations between the two countries' defense establishments.
sentences.chinese: 這一舉動令改善中美兩軍關係的努力暫停。

sentences.english: Sino-American relations belong  to the  complicatedest  bilateral   relations.
sentences.chinese: 中美關係是最爲複雜的一對雙邊關係。

sentences.english: Jatropha curcas is a non-edible shrub that is native to Central America.
sentences.chinese: 桐油樹是一種不可食用的灌木，原產於中美洲。

sentences.english: That would be good news for future stability and prosperity (SEHK: 0803, announcements, news) in both China and the US.
sentences.chinese: 這對中美兩國未來的穩定和繁榮都是好消息。

sentences.english: The Mayans lived in Central America thousands of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 數千年前，瑪雅人生活在中美洲。

sentences.english: I'm deputy managing director of the Sino-AmericanPharmaceutical Co. Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 我是中美製藥有限公司的副總經理。

sentences.english: Normalization of Sino-U. S. relations was thus achieved.
sentences.chinese: 自此，中美關係實現正常化。

sentences.english: By the spring of1972, the Sino-American Shanghai Communique had been signed.
sentences.chinese: 到了1972年春天，簽訂了中美上海公報。

sentences.english: Plus, of course, Central America, which has remained steadfastly pro-Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 當然，還有中美洲，此地仍然堅定的支持臺灣。

sentences.english: The "Sino-American high tech projects co-operation signing ceremony" was held in Shanghai today.
sentences.chinese: “中美合作高科技項目簽字儀式”今天在上海舉行。

sentences.english: Presented by the Chinese American veterans of the 14th Air Force.
sentences.chinese: 由第14航空隊的中美老兵贈送。

sentences.english: In 2011, the China-US relations maintained an over-all positive development momentum.
sentences.chinese: 一年來，中美關係總體保持了積極發展的勢頭。

sentences.english: Looking ahead, we are fully confident about the prospects of China-U.S. relations.
sentences.chinese: 展望未來，我們對中美關係發展前景充滿信心。

sentences.english: The Mesoamerican ballgame originated over three thousand years ago.
sentences.chinese: 而中美洲的球賽已有超過三千年的歷史。

sentences.english: On 1 January 1979 China and the United States formally established diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 中美兩國於一九七九年一月一日正式建立外交關係。
